articles.author: Elena Giordano
articles.title: Obama warns Israel's actions in Gaza could 'backfire' - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Former US president says cutting off food and water to Gaza could ‘harden Palestinian attitudes for generations.’
articles.content:
Former U.S. President Barack Obama warned that any actions by Israel that ignore the human cost of the war against Hamas “could ultimately backfire.”
In a statement  posted on the online site Medium… [+1005 chars]
